headline: Cloudflare Passes 250 Cities, Triples External Network Capacity, 8x-es Backbone
keywords: Speed Week, Cloudflare Network, Internet Performance
description: Today, I have three speedy infrastructure updates: weâ€™ve passed 250 on-network cities, more than tripled our external network capacity, and increased our long-haul internal backbone network by over 800% since the start of 2020.
